thread.title: Malawi fights cholera spread using drones

title: Malawi fights cholera spread using drones
text:
Malawi fights cholera spread using drones 9:43pm IST - 01:31 
Malawi is using drones to create maps of high risk areas to stem the spread of cholera, which has critically hit at least six districts following an outbreak in November. Matthew Bell reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Malawi is using drones to create maps of high risk areas to stem the spread of cholera, which has critically hit at least six districts following an outbreak in November. Matthew Bell reports.
